mapper.update: MERGE INTO PAGEVIEW USING dual ON (PV_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) AND PV_IP = #{pvIp}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PV_DATE, PV_CNT, PV_IP) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE), '1', #{pvIp}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PV_CNT = PV_CNT+1
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PV_IP) FROM PAGEVIEW WHERE PV_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(PV_IP)AS PV_IP, PV_DATE FROM PAGEVIEW p GROUP BY PV_DATE ORDER BY 1
